client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Outreach developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Outreach developer application.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: The token for obtaining the new access token.

redirect_uri.title: Redirect URI
redirect_uri.description: A Redirect URI is the location where the authorization server sends the user once the app has been successfully authorized and granted an authorization code or access token.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Outreach API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.
